data.news_body:
IL&FS Investment Managers Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 13/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve 1. The Unaudited Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025; 

2. The Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended December 31 2025; and

data.caption:
General - Updates : Board Comments On Fines Levied By The
Exchange On Delay In Submission Of Consolidated Financial Results For Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30 2025
data.news_body: Submission of Board Comments on fine levied by the Exchanges on delay in submission of consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Notice of Postal Ballot
data.news_body: Attached is the Postal Ballot Notice dated January 15 2026 seeking approval of members of the Company by way of remote e-voting process for continuation of Mr Chitranjan Singh Kahlon as Independent Non-Executive Director of the Company beyond the age of 75 years

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Board Approval On Continuation Of Independent Non-Executive Director Of The Company Beyond The Age Of 75 Years
data.news_body: The Board has approved the continuation of Mr. Chitranjan Singh Kahlon (DIN: 02823501) as an Independent Non-Executive Director of the Company beyond the age of 75 years subject to approval of the shareholders by way of a Special Resolution in accordance with Regulation 17(1A) of the SEBI LODR Regulations. The Board has further approved seeking shareholders approval by way of Postal Ballot through remote e-voting and has approved the draft Postal Ballot Notice along with the Explanatory Statement setting out the justification for such continuation. The Board has also approved the appointment of a Scrutinizer and authorised the concerned officers to undertake all acts and compliances in this regard.

data.descriptor: Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.news_body: Enclosing copy of the certificate dated January 1 2026 issued by MUFG Intime India Private Limited Registrars and Share Transfer Agents (RTA) of the Company confirming the compliance of Regulation 74(5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018 for the quarter ended December 31 2025

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of IL&FS Investment Managers Limited is proposed to be held on or before February 14 2026 inter alia to consider and approve the unaudited and limited reviewed financial results of the Company for the quarter ended December 31 2025

In view of the above and pursuant to our earlier communications dated September 26 2025 and the Companys code of conduct for Prohibition of Insider Trading framed under the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company shall continue to remain closed until further notice

data.caption: Shareholders Meeting - Adjournment Of The 39Th AGM Of The Company Due To Want Of Quorum
data.news_body:
The 39th AGM of the Company scheduled to be held today i.e Friday September 19 2025 at 11.00 a.m. through VC/OAVM could not be conducted due to want of quorum

Accordingly in terms of Section 103 of the Companies Act 2013 the AGM stands adjourned the same day in the next week i.e. on Friday September 26 2025 at 11.00 a.m. through VC/OAVM

The notice of the adjourned AGM remains the same as that of the original meeting

data.caption: Announcement Under Regulation 30 (LODR) - Updates - Adjournment Of The 39Th Annual General Meeting Of The Company Due To Want Of Quorum
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) 2015 this is to inform you that the 39th AGM of the Company scheduled to be held on Friday September 19 2025 at 11.00 a.m. through VC/OAVM could not be conducted due to want of quorum.

Accordingly in terms of the provisions of Section 103 of the Companies Act 2013 the AGM stands adjourned to the same day in the next week i.e. Friday September 26 2025 at 11 a.m. through VC/OAVM

The notice of the adjourned AGM remains the same as that of the original meeting

Kindly acknowledge and take the same on record

data.caption: Results For The Financial Year Ended March 31, 2021
data.news_body:
We send herewith the Audited Financial Results including the Cashflow statement of the Company, both Standalone and Consolidated, for the year ending March 31, 2021, which were approved at the Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company held on June 30, 2021, along with the copies of the Auditors' Reports which is qualified and the Statement on Impact of Audit Qualifications


We also wish to inform you that at the said Board Meeting, the Board recommended a dividend of 15% (0.30 paisa per share of the Face Value of ` 2/- each). The payment of the dividend is subject to approval of shareholders in the ensuing Annual General Meeting of the Company
